title: Selena Gomez Tickets at The Air Canada Centre, Sap Centre, American Airlines Arena, TD Garden, Marcus Amphitheater On Sale Today To The General Public at TicketProcess.com
text:
The tour will begin at the lavish Mandalay Bay Resort in Las Vegas on the evening of May 6. A handful of West Coast shows will follow in the upcoming weeks, highlighted by a Sacramento performance at the Sleep Train Arena on May 10. The North of the border run will begin in Vancouver at the Rogers Arena on May 14 and extend through May 26 with what is sure to be a huge set at the Bell Center in Montr√©al.
From there, the tour will spread its wings throughout the East Coast and dip into the South during the first half of June. It will travel North back to the heartland and into the Midwest for the remainder of the month before one last trip out West, covering the first week in July. The tour is currently scheduled to culminate with shows on July 6 at the Valley View Casino Center in San Diego and on July 8 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles.
Gomez recently released her second studio album as a solo artist, entitled Revival. It will have several months to top the charts and get fans acquainted with her most recent work before she hits the road to show it off live in front of sold-out audiences. Fans can find information and an abundance of ticket options now at TicketProcess.com.

Additionally, TicketProcess.com has no affiliation with any of the venues listed on the site. About TicketProcess.com
Since early in 2010, TicketProcess.com has been a secondary ticket exchange for both brokers and consumers. By offering a large selection of inventory to an array of the most exclusive sports, live concerts, theater events and other live entertainment, they have established their place as a reputable source of quality, guaranteed tickets for fans around the United States and beyond.
Seven-days-a-week customer service combined with a 100% satisfaction guarantee has proved to be a simple yet effective strategy for the constantly growing online secondary ticket market. All fans of live entertainment are openly welcome to visit the easily accessible site and purchase their tickets with the confidence that comes with a proven track record.
Following TicketProcess.com on Facebook, Twitter and Google+ will give you direct access to exclusive announcements and free discount codes, allowing you to access to all possible advantages in terms of purchasing the best ticket at the best possible price.
